Context: The college has water hydration stations located at various floors and areas around the campus. Some specific locations include near computer lab Room #E419 and washrooms on the Concourse (Ground Floor), two hydration stations each near north and south end of west hallways, and one near the elevator lobby in the east hallway (Second Floor). There are also hydration stations on Third Floor, Basement, First Floor, Second Floor, Third Floor, Fourth Floor, Fifth Floor, Sixth floor, Seventh Floor, Eighth Floor, and Floors 1 â€“ 5. Additionally, there is information about land acknowledgment and an invitation to sign up for college news and updates. Contact information provided includes a phone number (416-415-2000) and TTY number (1-877-515-5559), as well as an email address (ask.george@georgebrown.ca). The website disclaimer states that the information contained is subject to change without notice.
